title: Bug 45145 - Second window comes to front when using first
description: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front, covering my other applications' windows.
OB: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front, covering my other applications' windows.
EB: Currently, when switching from another application to one Eclipse window and interacting with a docked view or perspective, the other window unexpectedly comes to the front, obscuring my other applications' windows.
SR: The expected behavior is that when switching from another application to one Eclipse window and interacting with a docked view or perspective, the active window should remain in the front without obscuring other applications' windows.
